q_ch: 列出所有缝纫组的进度百分比。
q_en: List the progress percentage of all sewing groups

steps.sql: SELECT wg.name AS sewing_group_name, ROUND(SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(st.planned_number) * 100, 2) AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE wg.type = 'sew' GROUP BY wg.name;
steps.description: To list the progress percentage of all Sewing Groups, we need to calculate the progress percentage for each Sewing Group. We will join the sewing_tasks table with the working_group table on the working_group_id to identify the Sewing Groups and then calculate the progress percentage based on the completed number and planned number of sewing tasks.

response:
Sure! Here is the progress percentage of all Sewing Groups:

| Sewing Group Name | Progress Percentage |
|-------------------|---------------------|
| Advanced Sewers    | 81.96%              |
| Elite Sewers       | 44.07%              |
| Master Sewers      | 97.44%              |
| Premier Sewers     | 74.67%              |
| Skilled Sewers     | 97.22%              |

Feel free to ask if you have any more questions! 😄
